cause.description:
why would you want to see or furry friends being beaten or killed just because ppl don't like them or just because they roam around our neighborhood/go through our garbage... THEY ARE HUNGRY ! they deserve a happy life 2, they NEED 2 LIVE ~_~ ... u mean hipocrits, DON'T KILL WILD or DOMESTIC ANIMALS no matter the cause.
1. STOP ANIMAL MURDER !
2. QUIT killing wild animals that DIDNT commit any harm or crime towards us humans ...
cause.mission: stop the murder of another living thing
cause.name: ANIMALS DESERVE TO LIVE A LONG, HAPPY LIFE LIKE THE REST OF US
